fullplot: The immature and cheap douche bag Fèbio Clèvis marries the pseudo-intellectual Miè and they travel in a cruise to Europe on board of a fancy passenger vessel. Fabio and Miè are invited to have dinner with the wealthy Beto Assunèèo and his gorgeous wife Laura in a VIP restaurant on the vessel. Soon Fèbio discovers that Beto was Miè's boyfriend and Miè learns that Fèbio had a crush on Laura that was his classmate. Meanwhile the cynical chamber maid Suzana Mello and her estranged husband, the entertainer Wilson, make a bet that Fèbio and Miè will split before the end of the trip and poison their relationship. When the ship arrives in Casablanca, Fèbio meets his bothersome childhood friend Cabeèa that affects their honeymoon.
